column5: I'm exploring the possibilty of starting a new fishing club in the hook-ups section under "Brampton Wanna Bees" any ideas would be helpfull people
Would you have to be from Brampton??  If so, I'm out.
you wouldn't have to be from Brampton...but we would meet here.

my apologies to everyone out there whom I've seemed to have offended...thought this forum would be a perfect place to try this but I didn't realize that this was such a close community and a club of it's own of sorts...my sincere apologies to all...and I'll hang out on the outer edge here

....No need to apologize. I think trying to find like minded folk in your area for the purpose of getting together for some angling is part of what this board is about. I was surprised at some of the responses? Perhaps you should have called it a swill....lol
What did you do???  Just kidding, sounded like a nice idea for getting some like-minded people together for fishing.  Mike

I would never admit to living in Brampton,although I did for a few years.LOL J/K  If you got hate pm,s,up thiers. Good on ya for trying. There are some great waters in that area.  Dont give up,and for gods sake,get away from the edge,you may fall off.LOL   Ben you are out.....................way out there.
